product_name: Salomon S-Lab Sense 3 Ultra SG Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Salomon S-Lab Sense 3 Ultra SG Trail-Running Shoes are designed with a 4mm heel-to-toe drop that makes them ideal for midfoot and forefoot trail runners. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Uppers feature Endofit(TM) internal sleeves that are designed to hug the feet in exactly the right places for a great fit. Thermoplastic urethane overlays secure insteps and lock heels down. Thin layer of ProFeel film is placed within the soles to provide protection from the trail. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit. Tongues are designed to keep mud and debris from getting into the shoes. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon S-Lab Sense 3 Ultra SG Trail-Running Shoes deliver traction across mixed terrain and sloppy trail conditions.
short_description: The lightweight Salomon S-Lab Sense 3 Ultra SG Trail-Running Shoes are designed with a 4mm heel-to-toe drop that makes them ideal for midfoot and forefoot trail runners.
